message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am only willing to pay up to $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer. While I'm open to negotiation, $1500000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. Considering its unique features and potential for growth, I'm willing to come down to $1750000.  This compromise shows my commitment to a fair deal, and I believe it still represents excellent value for you.

I've reviewed your proposal, Alice. While I understand the value of your product, I am still not able to meet at $1750000. I would like to counter with an offer of $1600000. I hope this is within the range that would allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
